abstract: When applied correctly, the sparkly stuff can impart a bright, youthful energy to any look, without being juvenile.
snippet: When applied correctly, the sparkly stuff can impart a bright, youthful energy to any look, without being juvenile.
lead_paragraph: From Dior Haute Couture to the fall 2011 collections of Giles and Vena Cava, one thing is clear: glitter is unavoidable this season. And that's a good thing. When applied correctly, the sparkly stuff can impart a bright, youthful energy to any look, without being juvenile. Here, the Dior celebrity makeup artist Ricky Wilson explains how.
